description: The view holds the comments entered into bed blocks. The records included in this view are Bed Events (BEV) records that are designated as bed blocks -- that is, Event Type (I BEV 150) has a value of 1.

columns.name: BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMMENT_TEXT
columns.description: The text of the bed event comment.

columns.name: COMMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who entered the bed event comment.

columns.name: COMMENT_ADDED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the bed event comment was added.
